00054 class CSGPoint
00055 {
00056 public:
00064         double vertex[3];
00069         bool inside;
00070 
00074         CSGPoint () : inside(false) { SetCoord (0.0, 0.0, 0.0); };
00075 
00078         CSGPoint (double x, double y, double z)
00079         {
00080                 inside = false;
00081                 SetCoord (x, y, z);
00082         };
00083         
00085         double GetX() { return vertex[0]; };
00087         double GetY() { return vertex[1]; };
00089         double GetZ() { return vertex[2]; };
00090 
00092         inline void SetCoord (double x, double y, double z)
00093         {
00094                 vertex[0] = x; vertex[1] = y; vertex[2] = z;
00095         };
00096 };
00097 
00105 class CSGTriangle
00106 {
00107 public:
00112         double normal[3];
00116         CSGPoint *points[3];
00117 
00121         CSGTriangle ()
00122         {
00123                 points[0] = points[1] = points[2] = NULL;
00124                 SetNormal (0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00125         };
00126 
00130         inline void SetPoints (CSGPoint *p1, CSGPoint *p2, CSGPoint *p3) 
00131         {
00132                 points[0] = p1; points[1] = p2; points[2] = p3;
00133         };
00134 
00136         inline void SetNormal (double normalx, double normaly, double normalz)
00137         {
00138                 normal[0] = normalx; normal[1] = normaly; normal[2] = normalz;
00139         };
00140 
00147         bool IsInside (double x, double y, double z)
00148         {
00149                 CSGPoint p (x, y, z);
00150                 if (SameSide (points[0], points[1], points[2], &p) &&
00151                                 SameSide (points[1], points[2], points[0], &p) &&
00152                                 SameSide (points[2], points[0], points[1], &p))
00153                         return true;
00154 
00155                 return false;
00156         };
00157 
00158 private:
00159         /* performs the crossproduct of two vectors.
00160          * Here two points are used as vectors */
00161         CSGPoint *CrossProduct (CSGPoint *a, CSGPoint *b)
00162         {
00163                 CSGPoint *res = new CSGPoint ();
00164                 res->SetCoord (a->GetY() * b->GetZ() - b->GetY() * a->GetZ(),
00165                                                 a->GetZ() * b->GetX() - b->GetZ() * a->GetX(),
00166                                                 a->GetX() * b->GetY() - b->GetX() * a->GetY());
00167                 return res;
00168         };
00169         
00170         /* performs the dot product of two vectors 
00171          * Here two points are used as vectors */
00172         double DotProduct (CSGPoint *a, CSGPoint *b)
00173         {
00174                 return ((a->GetX() * b->GetX()) + 
00175                                 (a->GetY() * b->GetY()) + 
00176                                 (a->GetZ() * b->GetZ()));
00177         };
00178 
00179         /* Checks whether a point p is same side of the
00180          * line formed by points a and b, as that of
00181          * point c. Returns true if it is, false otherwise */
00182         bool SameSide (CSGPoint *a, CSGPoint *b, CSGPoint *c, CSGPoint *p)
00183         {
00184                 CSGPoint p1 (b->GetX() - a->GetX(), 
00185                                         b->GetY() - a->GetY(), 
00186                                         b->GetZ() - a->GetZ());
00187                 CSGPoint p2 (p->GetX() - a->GetX(),
00188                                         p->GetY() - a->GetY(),
00189                                         p->GetZ() - a->GetZ());
00190                 CSGPoint p3 (c->GetX() - a->GetX(),
00191                                         c->GetY() - a->GetY(),
00192                                         c->GetZ() - a->GetZ());
00193                 CSGPoint *cp1 = CrossProduct (&p1, &p2);
00194                 CSGPoint *cp2 = CrossProduct (&p1, &p3);
00195 
00196                 if (DotProduct (cp1, cp2) >= 0) 
00197                                 return true;
00198 
00199                 return false;
00200         };
00201 };

00209 class BoundBox
00210 {
00211 public:
00212         double x, y, z, w, h, d;
00213 
00232         BoundBox (double x, double y, double z, 
00233                 double w, double h, double d)
00234         {
00235                 this->x = x; this->y = y; this->z = z;
00236                 this->w = w; this->h = h; this->d = d;
00237         };
